item.title: Sniper [Medium] - Windows
item.description: Overview Sniper was one of my favorite boxes from recent memory. It leverages an RFI and Powershell constrained mode to eventually get a user shell. From there you poison a Windows Help (CHM) file in order to execute code as the Administrator user. Let’s take a look at how I did it. Please also note that the first part of this leverages a python script that I created; it’s referenced and included as a gist for your viewing.
